author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Define the geometry of the new Totem T2 detector defined for the Run3 period. The dd4hep version is in #29269

#### PR validation:

Tested with cfg files within Geometry/ForwardCommonData/test

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-sim60 Define the new Totem T2 for Run3
